changeSet.author: silvio
changeSet.createView: SELECT P.ID, P.GENDER, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.ADDRESS1 AS ADDRESS, P.ADDRESS2, P.ZIP, P.CITY, P.MOBILE, P.LANDLINE, P.EMAIL, P.PREF_CHANNEL, O.NAME AS ORGANIZATION FROM PERSON AS P INNER JOIN MEMBERSHIP AS M ON P.ID=M.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION AS O ON O.ID=M.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE M.LEAVE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY P.LAST_NAME;
